content: add a little color to your winter ensemble with a set of **wrist warmers ** 1 they re crocheted in universe xl which comes in many beautiful color combinations with a hint of glitter that really gets to shine in this project the design creates a lovely chunky texture and a pleasant fit you could combine it with the cool **headband** 2 from the same line have fun **materials ** hobbii universe xl color 03 crochet hook 4 **gauge** approx 19 sts x 15 row = 10 x 10 cm yarn usage approx 100 115 g **sizes ** s/m m/l **circumference ** approx 18-20 20-22 cm **length ** approx 21 5 cm **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st s ** stitch es **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet **fpdc** front post double_crochet **bpdc** back post double_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/havskum-wrist-warmers utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=wrist-warmers+hbtrack&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/havskum-headband utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=havskum-headband+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
